author: nero_eth
content:
I created some charts on mainnet blocks, everything around BAL size:
https://hackmd.io/@Nerolation/ByALtmDMee

Interestingly, it seems that getting rid of storage locations for size reasons might not actually bring the decreases in size I thought of. My guess is that the SSZ structure (which comes with an empty `SlotAccess.accesses` is very efficient for reads + many read accounts are also written to --> see hackmd for charts).
